message.body: All set for the wedding on Saturday?
I haven't forgotten, if that's what you mean. Can anyone truly be ready for such an unholy union?
Ha ha. I meant more asking the lines of people trying to slyly find out if we're dating instead of you just coming with me ;-)
Oh, right! I need to come up with some good responses
"We would date, but our equipment isn't compatible"
I like it. This is off to a good start. Ha ha
"Dating? When I came out of my coma, she said we were married!"
"We figure first cousins ain't so bad, long as we don't have young uns."
Okay, that's the one right there
By the way... I will try to minimize this, but you may have to keep me from falling down. I tend to wobble on non-flat shoes
Shit, I was counting on you for the same thing!
Well this should be entertaining then
I'm actually a little excited. Friend weddings are so much better than relative weddings
Heh. Let's hope for a good night.
Did you say you were coming down Friday or Saturday?
Actually Thursday, but in staying with ##### that night. So Friday during the day, because I have #####'s wedding Friday night
